info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central McDowell and west central Burke Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marion, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Morganton, Glen Alpine, Lake James State Park, Lake James, Nebo, North Cove, Pleasant Gardens, Woodlawn and Ashford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
